body: Does it need to valid delete action on slave? It may cause the topic remain undeleted on slave if we do this. And by the way why it is not merge into the newest 5.1.4? @HScarb

> Hello, I am replicating and enhancing the jraft experiment. I would like to consult you on the following questions:您好，我正在复制和增强 jraft 实验。我想就以下问题咨询您：
> 
> 1. In your experiment, are the controller, broker, etc. all deployed on the same machine? Because I noticed that you modified the code to use different ports such as localhost:9770, 9771, 9772, etc.在您的实验中，控制器、代理等是否都部署在同一台机器上？因为我注意到您修改了代码以使用不同的端口，例如 localhost：9770、9771、9772 等。
> 2. So if I have three distributed controllers, will they all expose ports 9880 and 9770 to the broker by default? Does the broker need any configuration for this?因此，如果我有三个分布式控制器，它们是否默认都向代理公开端口 9880 和 9770？代理是否需要对此进行任何配置？
> 3. Could you provide a complete sample configuration file for the proxy and broker? I would like to keep the parameters mostly the same.您能否为代理和代理提供完整的示例配置文件？我想保持参数基本相同。

1 yes
2 yes, broker  only change controllerAddr={NS_IP1}:9770,{NS_IP2}:9770,{NS_IP3}:9770
3 ns (with controller)
```
enableControllerInNamesrv=true
	controllerType=jRaft
	jRaftElectionTimeoutMs=1000
	jRaftSnapshotIntervalSecs=3600
	jRaftGroupId=jRaft-Controller
	jRaftServerId={LOCAL_IP}:9880
	jRaftInitConf={NS_IP1}:9880,{NS_IP2}}:9880,{NS_IP3}:9880
	jRaftControllerRPCAddr={NS_IP1}:9770,{NS_IP2}:9770,{NS_IP3}:9770
```
broker
```
enableControllerMode=true
controllerAddr={NS_IP1}:9770,{NS_IP2}:9770,{NS_IP3}:9770
```

I will take over this pull request later.

cc @yulangz
